newsitem.title: HONG KONG: HK's Tsang ready to review stock trade stamp duty.
newsitem.headline: HK's Tsang ready to review stock trade stamp duty.

text.p: Hong Kong Financial Secretary Donald Tsang said on Wednesday he was prepared to review the stamp duty rate on stock transactions.

"I will be willing to consider favourably on a case by case basis what incentives new products (on exchanges) might enjoy, including possibly some form of stamp duty concession," he told the legislature in his 1997/98 budget speech.
"Similarly, with stamp duty on stock transactions, I remain prepared to review the stamp duty rate once the industry has finalised its plans to reduce brokerage charges," he added.
